metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3904 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Qualcomm bus driver inAndroid before 2016-11-05 could enable a local malicious application toexecute arbitrary code within the context of the kernel. This issue israted as High because it first requires compromising a privileged process.Android ID: A-30311977. References: Qualcomm QC-CR#1050455.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
